description: This file is a C++ header defining the TDKB_TR181Stub class, which provides an interface for TR-181 parameter handling via RPC methods. It includes method declarations, external includes, and class members relevant to TR-181 stub operations.

classes.name: TDKB_TR181Stub
classes.description: A class implementing stub interface functions for TR-181 parameter operations, providing methods for GET, SET, ADD, DELETE, and setting multiple parameters over RPC using Json::Value.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the stub with the specified version.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Performs cleanup operations for the stub for the specified version.

methods.name: testmodulepre_requisites
methods.description: Checks and sets pre-requisites before running the test module.

methods.name: testmodulepost_requisites
methods.description: Performs post-requisite cleanup after test module execution.

methods.name: TDKB_TR181Stub_Get
methods.description: RPC wrapper function for retrieving TR-181 parameters by name.

methods.name: TDKB_TR181Stub_Set
methods.description: RPC wrapper function for setting TR-181 parameters.

methods.name: TDKB_TR181Stub_SetMultiple
methods.description: RPC wrapper function for setting multiple TR-181 parameters.

methods.name: TDKB_TR181Stub_AddObject
methods.description: RPC wrapper function for adding a TR-181 object.

methods.name: TDKB_TR181Stub_DelObject
methods.description: RPC wrapper function for deleting a TR-181 object.

methods.name: TDKB_TR181Stub_SetOnly
methods.description: RPC wrapper function for setting a TR-181 parameter with specific type.
